parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the cloud account.

parameters.name: CloudCode
parameters.description:
The code that is used for multi-cloud environments. Valid values:

*   qcloud: Tencent Cloud
*   aliyun: Alibaba Cloud
*   hcloud: Huawei Cloud

parameters.name: DataSourceInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the data source. The value is obtained after the threat analysis feature calculates the MD5 hash value of a parameter.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The data management center of the threat analysis feature. Specify this parameter based on the region where your assets reside. Valid values:

*   cn-hangzhou: Your assets reside in regions inside China.
*   ap-southeast-1: Your assets reside in regions outside China.
